long_description: The Profile T1+ Aluminum aero bars feature plenty of adjustability to get you into a more comfortable, aerodynamic position when you're looking to set a new PR! The multiposition ski bend aluminum extensions provide a variety of hand positions and are suitable for triathlon and time trial use. Equipped with "J2" Brackets(TM) for an adjustable lower arm position. Injection molded F-22(TM) anatomic armrests are length, width, and rotationally adjustable for a fully customizable fit. Forged 6061-T6 aluminum brackets provide a secure, stable attachment to handlebar; fits 26.0 - 31.8mm handlebars.
short_description: The Profile T1+ Aluminum aero bars feature plenty of adjustability to get you into a more comfortable, aerodynamic position when you're looking to set a new PR!
